metadata.title: CVE-2018-9058 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
In Long Range Zip (aka lrzip) 0.631, there is an infinite loop in therunzip_fd function of runzip.c. Remote attackers could leverage thisvulnerability to cause a denial of service via a crafted lrz file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-9058` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

lrzip - 0.616-1ubuntu0.1~esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: lrzip package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.616-1ubuntu0.1~esm1').
